name: Out Of Law: Retro Game 1976
description:
Out Of Law is a 2D cowboy shooter local multiplayer game. 

You're an old west cowboy that is having a duel with his worse enemy score 7 points first to Win the duel.  Use your heavy bullet wisely!!
FEATURES:

  • 2 Players local keyboard game, no controller support yet
  • You can shoot regular bullets indefinitely to try to kill your rival
  • You have one heavy Bullet that is bigger, faster and can bounce walls up to 3 times
  • There are 4 scenes to choose your battle arena

There might be some undetected bugs, please report them

Email Me | Instagram @jhimmy_ad   | Youtube Channel

CONTROLS:

Player 1:

Move:   W, S, A, D    -     Fire1: H      -                     Fire2: J

Player2:

Move:   Arrows       -       Fire1: keypad4      -      Fire2: keypad5

Credits: Jhimmy Astoraque Durán Made using Unity Engine
